h2_title: Flint Chief Boss Fight and Guide
content: When you've beaten it collect the Flint Chief Spirit it drops and the Fire Date from the tree to the right of the lava flowing from the ceiling.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Chief.md', within the main section titled 'Flint Chief', specifically from the subsection 'Flint Chief Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When you've beaten it collect the Flint Chief Spirit it drops and the Fire Date from the tree to the right of the lava flowing from the ceiling.
